Text: Obama is a moron! He ran a dirty campaign and slandered his opponents and his predicessor! I was in the Army shen he was eleceted and I was asking black people who they were voting for. About 95% instantly said Obama! When I asked them why they didnt know. So I asked how they felt about his "policies" and of those 95% about 85% had NO CLUE what he stood for! They just voed for him because of race! I started losing faith in the people of this country right then. If Obama gets RE-elected then I might just lose it! Ha ha, He id seriously a monster people!
